common.missingEnv: The "{option}" option is configured as an environment variable, but there is no environment variable with the name "{value}" set.
common.optionInvalidHexBase64: The "{option}" does not appear to be hex or base64. "{value}"
common.optionInvalidBech32: The "{option}" does not appear to be bech32. "{value}"
common.optionMinValue: The "{option}" option must be greater than or equal to {minValue}, it is {value}.
common.optionMaxValue: The "{option}" option must be less than or equal to {maxValue}, it is {value}.

lang.description: The language to display the output in.

load-env.description: Load the env files to initialise any environment variables.
